data.eml:eml: Glyceridae (Annelida: Polychaeta) from Guam, Mariana Islands with description of a new species of Glycera Savigny in Lamarck, 1818

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Magalhães, Wagner F., Rizzo, Alexandra E. (2012): Glyceridae (Annelida: Polychaeta) from Guam, Mariana Islands with description of a new species of Glycera Savigny in Lamarck, 1818. Zootaxa 3338: 60-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.281380
